name: QUALITY_TRACKING
description: This table contains information about the Quality Tracking elements that are documented on an order.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ELEMENT_PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description: The priority category ID for the Quality Tracking Priority (a user-entered category value that indicates the relative importance associated with a given quality tracking element on an imaging order).
